name: Lucian Merciless
rules_text:
(When you play me, you may EQUIP one of your Equipment to me for less, even if it's already attached.)
The first time I conquer each turn, ready me.

params.summary: (When you play me, you may EQUIP one of your Equipment to me for less, even if it's already attached.)
The first time I conquer each turn, ready me.

flavor: “One of us finds peace. One of us walks away.”
